document.discussion_title: Marquis Medical Â» PET/MRI bests other modalities in imaging liver metastases related to colorectal cancer
document.topic_text: April 25, 2016 PET/MRI bests other modalities in imaging liver metastases related to colorectal cancer Combined PET/MRI outperforms multidetector CT and PET alone in evaluating colorectal cancer liver metastases (CRLMs), according to study results published online April 19 in the journal Radiology. { read more here } Comments
